Envoy - San Francisco (ONSITE, VISA and relocation support)

Envoy is a beautiful, modern visitor sign in system for the iPad. Collect visitor information along with support for signing NDAs, printing badges, or automatically sending SMSs to their hosts. We have unheard-of word-of-mouth growth, early (and sustained) revenue (pretty rare around here!), and customers who adore our products and support.

We're looking for iOS, Rails and Ember engineers. We want people who use the right tool for the job. It's not always about perfect code, and it's not always about hitting deadlines; we look for a healthy balance of both.

Weâ€™re still small, and as Envoy grows, we'd like your responsibility to grow too. We live and breath autonomy (make your own decisions), mastery (learn from smart people), and purpose (build what people want).

https://envoy.co/jobs/

Reach out to jobs@envoy.co if you're interested or see my email in profile.
